alert.note: Alert for Concho; Runnels; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 9:49PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tom Green, south central Runnels and Concho Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 948 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vancourt, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Millersview around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, The Intersection Of Us- 87 And Ranch Road 2134, Vick, The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 765, and The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 1929. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
